code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useContext}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{CartContext}from'../context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Product(){const{id}=useParams();const[p,setP]=useState(null);const{add}=useContext(CartContext);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/products/'+id).then(r=>setP(r.data)).catch(()=>{});},[id]);if(!p)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",style:{padding:'30px 0'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/shop",children:"\u2190 Back to shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:20,marginTop:12},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:p.images&&p.images[0],alt:p.title,style:{width:420,borderRadius:12}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{flex:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:p.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"small",children:p.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["\u20B9",p.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:12},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>add(p),children:"Add to Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"btn",to:"/checkout",children:"Buy Now"})]})]})]})]});}
